name: Hungry Hungry Monster
description:
Short game made for MigJam #6. You are a monster that is constantly hungry and needing to eat. The issue is the monsters appetite changes frequently and gets sick if not eating what their current craving is. Fill your hungry meter to satisfy your monster. Have fun and stay FULL.

Theme: Always Hungry

Limitation: Picky Eater

Made in Unity

Aseprite used for the pixel art

Bosca Ceoil for the music

Sounds used:

https://freesound.org/people/brookmorgan/sounds/189566/

https://freesound.org/people/aabbccddee123/sounds/469930/
